ygData.subject: Re: Gladiator Tournament
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The only problem is that multiplayer Gladiator still is not possible unless it is on the same computer.  This means that only singler- player touraments
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 24
Message-ID: <17248.24.85.959279670@...>
Date: Sat, 20 Mar 1999 23:40:26 -0500
From: "Seth Mitchell" <smitchell@...>
Subject: Re: Gladiator Tournament

> I'm thinking it would be cool if we got some kind
> of Gladiator tournament going on.  I've written
> out a basic outline of how the rules would work
> on my own, and would be happy to organize it, but
> I need to know if anyone would participate.

The only problem is that multiplayer Gladiator still is not possible 
unless it is on the same computer.  This means that only singler-
player touraments are possible.  The problem with that is that 
people can cheat in single player mode.  
--
SgMitchell
